name: Gosavex
slogan: The financial platform which helps budgeting finance and gets better returns on savings
description: Gosavex is a financial platform with the objective to help our customers boost their finances by providing better returns on their savings, help to manage their budget and provide access to cheaper loans.

team.title: CEO, Founder
team.name: Seweryn Bidolach
team.bioHtml: Startup entrepreneur, passionate about Blockchain and FinTech Industry! Working on the app, which can improve transparency of payments flow in charity!

team.name: Yugo Sakamoto
team.bioHtml: Graduated at Universidade Federal de Viçosa, experience with Java EE and Javascript development.

jobs.title: Head of Marketing / Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for an enthusiastic marketing intern to join our team and provide creative ideas to help achieve our goals. Our marketing department seeks an intern who can participate in various stages of print and online marketing campaigns.

We can help you acquire marketing skills. Ultimately, you will gain broad experience in marketing and should be prepared to enter any fast paced work environment.

Responsibilities:

* Take over content creation for all of our company social media accounts (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter) 
* Writing articles on company blog with topics about saving, debt, loans, company news, feature descriptions
* Develop newsletter campaign  from the ground up with content about product features, company and industry news
* Assist with capturing and analyzing social media and product metrics (Google Analytics & Adwords, Facebook Analytics, Google Play Store, Apple Store, Amplitude)
* Developing media contacts and generating ideas to gain media coverage
* Leading a team to organise media events and promotional activities

If this sounds like you, we would love to meet up and take this forward. 

How to apply: Please send an e-mail to contact@gosavex.com with a cover letter and resume with the subject: Head of Marketing
